original_text:
“Greatly have they afflicted me from my youth,
    yet they have not prevailed against me.
korean_text: 그들이 내가 어릴 때부터 여러 번 나를 괴롭혔으나 나를 이기지 못하였도다

sentences.original_text: Greatly have they afflicted me from my youth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내 어린 시절부터 나를 크게 괴롭혔습니다

sentences.original_text: yet they have not prevailed against me.
